weekComments.content: The burning is caused by the build up of lactic acid in the muscles. The best cure for this is to build up the muscles so that they can react for a longer period of time before the lactic acid builds up. It is also possible that you are not getting enough oxygen. Exercise is key, healthy muscle requires less O2.

monthComments.content: Other health problems are called co-morbidities. Because the heart and lungs work so closely together, COPD may put a strain on your heart, so heart disease is a common co-morbidity. Of course, additional chronic health problems call for close monitoring, and possibly additional medications, but with proper management you may still enjoy a long life :)
